channel.title: NPC Trading
channel.description:
Hello,
I get this error whenever I trade with NPC's. It happened randomly and I do not know how to fix it. Any help will be much appreciated.
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -110 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19003) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17547) at client.process(client.java:17517) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50)[/code] [br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 10:08:58 AM[/size][hr]anybody?
